Title: Day 3: 12:00 P.M.-1:00 P.M.
Plot:
Jack and Chase must make a powerful sacrifice when dealing with the virus.

Tony is able to help Jack one last time before he is taken into custody, while an angry victim seeks vengeance on Saunders.

Palmer makes a surprising career choice in the wake of Sherry's death.
GuestStars: Kamala Lopez Dawson,  Michael Cavanaugh,  Salvator Xuereb,  Jenette Goldstein,  Randy Thompson,  Cathy Herd,  Kevin McCorkle,  Conroe Brooks,  Andre Rishi,  Steve Lanza,  Bob Jesser
